A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]] ''' was released on '''January 11, 2010''', at 22:10 UTC<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(17:11:26) <Notch> ok, reload indev now and press F11 in it for fullscreen mode. Does it work?"</ref>, which fixed fullscreen mode not working. It was announced, bundled with [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100111-2207|the previous version]], on [[The Word of Notch]] at 22:25 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:329337442|Fullscreen mode in indev]] – The Word of Notch, January 11, 2010</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed fullscreen mode not working. <ref name=":0" />
